metadata.title: CVE-2015-8614 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple stack-based buffer overflows in the (1) conv_jistoeuc, (2)conv_euctojis, and (3) conv_sjistoeuc functions in codeconv.c in Claws Mailbefore 3.13.1 allow remote attackers to have unspecified impact via acrafted email, involving Japanese character set conversion.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8614` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

claws-mail - 3.13.2-1ubuntu1
claws-mail-acpi-notifier - 3.13.2-1ubuntu1
